trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: New-EventLog
trans-unit.target: New-EventLog

trans-unit.source: New-EventLog
trans-unit.target: New-EventLog

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Creates a new event log and a new event source on a local or remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 在本地或远程计算机上创建新事件日志和新事件源。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **New-EventLog** cmdlet creates a new classic event log on a local or remote computer.
trans-unit.target: **New-eventlog** cmdlet 在本地或远程计算机上创建新的传统事件日志。

trans-unit.source: It can also register an event source that writes to the new log or to an existing log.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它还会注册写入新日志或现有日志的事件源。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlets that contain the **EventLog** noun (the **EventLog** cmdlets) work only on classic event logs.
trans-unit.target: 包含的 cmdlet **EventLog** 名词 ( **EventLog** cmdlet) 仅在传统事件日志上工作。

trans-unit.source: To get events from logs that use the Windows Event Log technology in Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, use the Get-WinEvent cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要从使用 Windows Vista 和更高版本的 Windows 操作系统中的 Windows 事件日志技术的日志获取事件，请使用 Get-winevent cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Create an event log and register its source
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 创建事件日志并注册其源

trans-unit.source: This command creates the TestLog event log on the local computer and registers a new source for it.
trans-unit.target: 此命令在本地计算机上创建 TestLog 事件日志并为该日志注册新源。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Add an event source to the Application log
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 将事件源添加到应用程序日志

trans-unit.source: This command adds a new event source, NewTestApp, to the Application log on the Server01 remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将一个新事件源 NewTestApp 添加到 Server01 远程计算机上的应用程序日志。

trans-unit.source: The command requires that the NewTestApp.dll file is located on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 该命令要求 NewTestApp.dll 文件位于 Server01 计算机上。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -CategoryResourceFile
trans-unit.target: -CategoryResourceFile

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path of the file that contains category strings for the source events.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含源事件的类别字符串的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: This file is also known as the Category Message File.
trans-unit.target: 此文件也称为“类别消息文件”。

trans-unit.source: The file must be present on the computer on which the event log is being created.
trans-unit.target: 文件必须存在于正在创建事件日志的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not create or move files.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不会创建或移动文件。

trans-unit.source: -ComputerName
trans-unit.target: -ComputerName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the computers on which this cmdlet creates new event logs.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 将在其创建新的事件日志的计算机。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: Type the NetBIOS name, an IP address or a fully qualified domain name of a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 键入 NetBIOS 名称、 IP 地址或远程计算机的完全限定的域名。

trans-unit.source: To specify the local computer, type the computer name, a dot (.), or localhost.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定本地计算机，请键入计算机名称、 句点 （.） 或 localhost。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not rely on Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不依赖于 Windows PowerShell 远程处理。

trans-unit.source: You can use the *ComputerName* parameter of **New-EventLog** even if your computer is not configured to run remote commands.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 *ComputerName* 参数 **New-eventlog** 即使您的计算机未配置为运行远程命令。

trans-unit.source: -LogName
trans-unit.target: -LogName

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the event log.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件日志的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the log does not exist, **New-EventLog** creates the log and uses this value for the **Log** and **LogDisplayName** properties of the new event log.
trans-unit.target: 如果日志不存在， **New-eventlog** 创建日志，并使用此值用于 **日志** 和 **LogDisplayName** 的新的事件日志属性。

trans-unit.source: If the log exists, **New-EventLog** registers a new source for the event log.
trans-unit.target: 如果该日志存在， **New-eventlog** 注册事件日志的新来源。

trans-unit.source: -MessageResourceFile
trans-unit.target: -MessageResourceFile

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path of the file that contains message formatting strings for the source events.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含的消息格式字符串的源事件的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: This file is also known as the Event Message File.
trans-unit.target: 此文件也称为“事件消息文件”。

trans-unit.source: The file must be present on the computer on which the event log is being created.
trans-unit.target: 文件必须存在于正在创建事件日志的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not create or move files.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不会创建或移动文件。

trans-unit.source: -ParameterResourceFile
trans-unit.target: -ParameterResourceFile

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path of the file that contains strings used for parameter substitutions in event descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含用于事件描述中的参数替换的字符串的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: This file is also known as the Parameter Message File.
trans-unit.target: 此文件也称为“参数消息文件”。

trans-unit.source: The file must be present on the computer on which the event log is being created.
trans-unit.target: 文件必须存在于正在创建事件日志的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not create or move files.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不会创建或移动文件。

trans-unit.source: -Source
trans-unit.target: -Source

trans-unit.source: Specifies the names of the event log sources, such as application programs that write to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件日志源（如写入事件日志的应用程序）的名称。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将输入传递给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry
trans-unit.target: System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: To use **New-EventLog** on Windows Vista and later versions of the Windows operating system, open Windows PowerShell by using Run as administrator option.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 **New-eventlog** 使用作为管理员选项运行，在 Windows Vista 和更高版本的 Windows 操作系统上，打开 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: To create an event source in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional, or Windows Server 2003, you must be a member of the Administrators group on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Windows Vista、Windows XP Professional 或 Windows Server 2003 中创建事件源，则你必须是计算机上 Administrators 组的成员。

trans-unit.source: When you create a new event log and a new event source, the system registers the new source for the new log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it.
trans-unit.target: 创建新事件日志和新事件源时，系统会为新日志注册新源，但只有在新日志中写入首个条目时才会创建该日志。

trans-unit.source: The operating system stores event logs as files.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统将事件日志存储为文件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 创建新事件日志时，会将关联的文件存储在指定计算机上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目录中。

trans-unit.source: The file name is the first eight characters of the Log property that has an .evt file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 文件名是带有.evt 文件扩展名的 Log 属性的第一次八个字符。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接
